channel.title: How can i make npc more powerful?
channel.description: sup guys, i need a bit of help with my 317, i cant figure out how i can make corporal beast and my gwd bosses more powerful?

item.title: How can i make npc more powerful?
item.dc:creator: @iamapker iamapker
item.description:
@iamapker wrote:

what do you mean more powerful? like them hitting harder or them having a higher def etc… ill help on both.

  1. go to npchandler.java

  2. press Ctrl+F and search for int rand = misc.random(def);

then under that find the Npc Ids that you want to edit, so i dont know your corp id but find out and look for it in this list so lets say your corp id is 7777 then you would find this under that code above

[code] }
if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 7777) {
rand_npc = misc.random(200);[code]
the 7777 ofcourse is its ID and the 200 is it defence. you can change the 200 to whatever you want. now if you want it to hit harder then it is.

  1. again in Npchandler.java

  2. Search for the corp beast ID until you see something like this

if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 7777) { hitDiff = misc.random(99);

when you see that the 99 is the max hit it can do and the misc.random makes it hit anything between 0-99 so change the 99 to anything you want but dont go over 99 as hp is 99 highest.

Hope to Helped!

Read full topic
item.source: How can i make npc more powerful?
